conversation.content: Hi, I received a promo code for a discount on my next flight booking. How can I redeem it?
Hello! You can redeem your promo code during the checkout process. Simply enter the code in the 'Promo Code' box on the payment page.
Great, does the promo code have any restrictions or expiration date?
Yes, most promo codes have an expiration date and may be limited to specific routes or travel dates. Could you provide the code so I can check the details for you?
Sure, the code is FLY2023.
Thank you. Let me verify the details of your promo code.
The promo code FLY2023 offers a 15% discount and is valid until December 31, 2023. It can be used for any international flight booking.
Perfect, I'll make sure to use it before it expires. Thanks for the help!
You're welcome! Enjoy your discount and have a great trip. If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.
Hello, I saw a promo for free baggage allowance on your website. How do I apply it to my booking?
Hi there! To apply the free baggage allowance promo, you need to enter the promo code during the booking process on the payment page.
Do I need to enter the promo code at a specific step during booking?
Yes, please enter the promo code in the 'Promo Code' field during the payment step. This will automatically apply the free baggage allowance to your booking.
Got it. Is there any way to check if the promo was successfully applied before finalizing the booking?
Certainly! Once the code is entered, the discount will be reflected in your booking summary before you confirm and pay.
Great, thanks for the guidance.
You're welcome! If you need further assistance or have more questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful flight!
Hi, I have a loyalty program voucher for an upgrade. Can I use it online?
Hello! Yes, you can use your loyalty program voucher for an upgrade when booking online. Please enter the voucher code in the 'Voucher Code' field during the seat selection process.
What if I already booked my flight? Can I still use the voucher to upgrade?

Certainly! If you've already booked your flight, you can apply the voucher by managing your booking online. Simply enter the voucher code in the 'Manage Booking' section and select the upgrade option.
Are there any restrictions on which flights I can upgrade with the voucher?

Yes, some restrictions may apply based on the voucher type. Typically, upgrades are subject to availability and may not apply to certain promotional fares or partner airlines. I recommend checking the terms and conditions of your voucher.
Okay, I'll check that. Thanks for the information!
You're welcome! If you need any more help or have further questions, feel free to reach out. Enjoy your upgraded flight experience!
Hello, I got an email about a seasonal discount. How can I use it for my booking?
Hi! To use your seasonal discount, you need to enter the promo code provided in the email during the checkout process on our website.
Where exactly do I enter the promo code?
You'll find a 'Promo Code' field on the payment page. Enter the code there, and the discount will be applied to your total fare.
Is the discount applicable to all flights?
The seasonal discount is applicable to selected flights. Please check the email details or our website for the list of eligible routes and travel dates.
Thanks, I'll make sure to do that.
You're welcome! If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. Enjoy your discounted flight!
Hi, I have a promo code for an extra legroom seat. How do I redeem it when booking?
Hello! You can redeem your promo code for an extra legroom seat during the seat selection process. Just enter the code in the 'Promo Code' field provided.
Is there an additional cost for the extra legroom seat even with the promo code?
With the promo code, the extra legroom seat should be free or discounted, depending on the terms of the promo. The discount will be reflected in your booking summary.
What if the extra legroom seats are sold out?
If extra legroom seats are unavailable, you can try selecting them again closer to your departure date, as availability may change. Alternatively, contact our customer service for assistance.
Alright, thanks for the help!
You're welcome! If you need further assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a comfortable flight!
